item.title: Certificate Transparency Bots
item.description:
What happened?

Backstory

I was setting up a new subdomain on my VPS, I thought I had everything correctly configured but the new subdomain was being routed to another application. After an hour of troubleshooting I made the decisions to reconfigure the whole server using nginxconfig.io as a baseline. Within 15 minutes of entering all the information, downloading and extracting to my server I had everything ready to go.

The attack

I requested certificates from Lets Encrypt and had malicious requests sent to my services that were mitigated by Crowdsec.
